ygData.subject: Re: Question..need help....
ygData.msgSnippet: 12 hours? Ouch - glad it worked though! I also noticed that after I did the complete file check that I had less problems with my game randomly crashing or with
ygData.messageBody:
12 hours? Ouch - glad it worked though!

I also noticed that after I did the complete file check that I had
less problems with my game randomly crashing or with other bugs.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "bubi_g_67" <bubi_g_67@y...> wrote:
> Thanks for the advice. I clicked the advanced button (which I've
> never done before) to fine that my Kunark expansion wasn't even
> checked along with the other five....big problem there. Because I
> don't have high speed internet service, it took 12 hours to update
> BUT, the problem is now fixed. Thanks so much for your help!
